content.query:
CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE EDS_salescustomer WITH
(
	TYPE = HADOOP,
	LOCATION = 'https://nxtgenstagingdl.blob.core.windows.net/salescustomer'
)

CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE EDS_salesInvoice WITH
(
	TYPE = HADOOP,
	LOCATION = 'https://nxtgenstagingdl.blob.core.windows.net/salesinvoice'
)

CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE EDS_salesOrders WITH
(
	TYPE = HADOOP,
	LOCATION = 'https://nxtgenstagingdl.blob.core.windows.net/salesorders'
)

CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT coma_seperate_text_compression
WITH
(  
    FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT,
    DATA_COMPRESSION = 'org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.GzipCodec'
)

CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT coma_seperate_text
WITH
(  
    FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT
    --DATA_COMPRESSION = 'org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.GzipCodec'
)

--DROP EXTERNAL TABLE [Customers]
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE [Customers](
	[CustomerID] [int],
	[CustomerName] [nvarchar](100),	
	[PhoneNumber] [nvarchar](20),
	[FaxNumber] [nvarchar](20),	
	[WebsiteURL] [nvarchar](256),
	[DeliveryAddressLine1] [nvarchar](60),
	[DeliveryAddressLine2] [nvarchar](60),
	[DeliveryPostalCode] [nvarchar](10),
	[PostalAddressLine1] [nvarchar](60),
	[PostalAddressLine2] [nvarchar](60),
	[PostalPostalCode] [nvarchar](10)
)
WITH(
	LOCATION = '/',
    DATA_SOURCE = EDS_salescustomer,
    FILE_FORMAT = coma_seperate_text_compression
)

select top 100 * from [Customers]
